is.ru.honn.rutube.factory

Class ReaderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.ru.honn.rutube.factory.ReaderFactory

  • public class ReaderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0, 02/10/16 This is a factory class which gets the Reader in the reader.xml and returns it.
    Author:
    Steinar Marinó Hilmarsson and Egill Gautur Steingrímsson.

      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReaderFactory

        Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getReaderType

        public Reader getReaderType(java.lang.String readerBean)
                     throws FactoryException
        Gets the Reader type from the value which it is called with. Should be either userReader or videoReader else it throws factory exception.
        Parameters:
        readerBean - Is the Reader type. it is either userReader or videoReader.
        Returns:
        The Reader type.
        Throws:
        FactoryException - Throws factory exception if there was no bean with the name given.
